commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: My, I can't believe it.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You're helping your enemy who's trying to destroy your club?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We disagree on many things, but I have never thought of her as our enemy. At the very least, she is not a bad person.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You're too softhearted.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I was fine helping her, but once I heard Shioko would be practicing with us, I was like, "Seriously?!"

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: It's a drastic move.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I thought it seemed like a good chance, so it felt natural to ask her.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Chance?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup. I want to use this opportunity to make her realize how great school idols are.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Are you sure about this? Doesn't she believe being a school idol is a waste of time?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: She's probably just pretending to be your friend so she can break up the club from the inside!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't worry. She's not that evil.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: However, if she doesn't have a good impression of school idols, she won't put much effort into practice, will she?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah, it wouldn't be fun if she was grumbling the whole time.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: This is the time to be firing yourselves up for the School Idol Festival. What are you going to do if she ruins your motivation?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Don't worry about that. If anything, I'm more motivated than ever.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Huh?! What do you mean, zura?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shioriko has been diligently practicing so that she can keep up with the others. She was even first to arrive at morning practice the other day.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Wow, excellent!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yup. She always asks for help when she has a question and learns the songs and dances quickly by practicing them over and over. Seeing that makes us want to work harder, too.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I must say I'm a bit surprised. However, it is wonderful that things have turned out this way.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I think she takes everything she does seriously. So no matter what happens, I find it hard to dislike her.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, I want to get to know her better.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Me too. If we understand each other better, we can be friends.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes. Honestly, I didn't find her approachable at first, but since we started spending so much time together, my impression of her has completely changed.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Same. I thought we would bump heads more, but she's been surprisingly obedient.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, when I'm talking to her, I start to think that maybe she doesn't hate school idols after all.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: But that's what she claims. Rina-chan Board says, "Question mark?"

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Hmm, maybe she's just saying that. But...that's strange, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I wonder why Shioriko acts like she's so against school idols.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Maybe something happened to her in the past.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Like what?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Th-That, I don't know...

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: If it were me... I would just ask her straight-up.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I don't think she'd give a straight answer.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Then there's no use thinking about it. She's giving it her all at practice, so that's good enough for now, right?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah, if anything happens we can just deal with it when it comes!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, I think you guys are right.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Let's put aside this Mifune stuff for now. More people are learning about the School Idol Festival each day. I keep receiving one message of support after another.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: You can really feel the wave we released starting to spread.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: However, it is not enough that people hear about the festival. We must make it an event that they will want to actually attend.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: In order to do that, we need people to learn more about us and not just the event.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah. We need to become a group that people will feel like they want to see or put on a live show with.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: And for that, we need more people to see us! I wanna do a live show!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: To start, we need the live show at the Nijigasaki school tour to be a hit.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A lot of people will be attending the school tour, so we'll try our best.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Let's make it a great live show no matter what!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Can we go to the live show and hand out flyers for the School Idol Festival?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: That's a great idea, zura!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I wanna help, too! But if I see a live show, I might turn into a regular fan and start cheering!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Then let's go as fans and hype everyone up!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: No, you have to help.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* I definitely want you guys to see the live show! We can pass out flyers together after the school tour ends.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Totally!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: By the way, is there any update on the School Idol Festival venue?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Oh, yeah... We're having trouble finding a place that meets all our conditions.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: There are many things we cannot do until we have picked a place. We must figure something out and quick.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Right? There isn't much time left, so let's try our best to find a place!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Phew, that was another great meeting. What μ's and Aqours are doing is incredible. We can't lose to them!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah. We need to make sure the club introductions go well!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh yeah! I had a favor to ask about that.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: A favor?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um, I'm discussing the club introductions with each club, but that means I'm taking on a student council role.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Because of that, I'm considered a representative of the student council and can't attend the school tour meetings as the club president.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry, Setsuna and Ayumu, but can you keep attending the meetings in my place?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Sure, I don't mind at all.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Me neither.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Great, thank you! I'll try my best to negotiate with all of the clubs, so let's make the club introductions... No, the entire school tour, a success!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
